reservations.name: Quality Inn
reservations.description: Comfortable motel located in New Jersey with free breakfast and Wi-Fi.

transportation.name: NJ Transit Train
transportation.description: Round trip train tickets from NYC to New Jersey.

vacation.climate: mild spring climate with temperatures averaging between 50°F and 70°F.

day1.day_description: Arrive in New Jersey and explore local parks and dining options.

activities.title: The Cheesecake Factory
activities.description: A popular chain known for its extensive menu and delicious cheesecakes.

activities.title: Tavern on the Lake
activities.description: Family-friendly restaurant offering a great view of the lake and delicious American cuisine.

activities.title: Dinosaur Island
activities.description: An outdoor adventure park featuring life-sized dinosaur replicas and activities for children.

activities.title: Lake Hopatcong
activities.description: A tranquil lake providing opportunities for walking, fishing, and enjoying nature.

day2.day_description: Visit historical sites and enjoy local dining experiences.

activities.title: Pasta e Vino
activities.description: Authentic Italian restaurant known for its fresh pasta and wine selection.

activities.title: Café Amici
activities.description: Charming café offering artisan coffee and light bites.

activities.title: Morristown National Historical Park
activities.description: Explore the historical significance of the area with guided walks and information centers.

activities.title: Red Bank's Count Basie Theater
activities.description: Catch a live performance or show at this renowned theater.
